entity.title: crm app cust request supplementory listing

entity.description: Entity to store the leave order info

entity.title: Convenience entity to associate security permission groups and descriptions of team roles
Supplemental detail about a party, either a person or party group

field.name: parentPartyId
field.description: This is for arranging the parties in a heiarchial structure.

field.name: generalProfTitle
field.description: This is a general professional title (CEO, VP) which mirrors PartyRelationship.relationshipName. Again, created for use in cases where specific relationships aren't needed

field.name: companyName
field.description: This field is a temporary holding field for company name of a Person who is a lead (PROSPECT). Later it will be used to create a PartyGroup of role ACCOUNT if/when the lead is converted. Do not use this for any other purpose.

field.name: companyNameLocal
field.description: This field is a temporary holding field for company name of a Person who is a lead (PROSPECT). Later it will be used to create a PartyGroup of role ACCOUNT if/when the lead is converted. Do not use this for any other purpose.

field.name: importantNote
field.description: Important note which will be shown on quotes, orders, etc. for this party

entity.title: Party deactivations are soft or hard and not by status, this entity records when they were deactivated. No foreign keys because partyId might be deleted.
